column1: #Text=Bato says : " There 's something I should tell you kids .
#Text=Your father said he 'd send a message when they found the rendezvous point .
#Text=If you wait until the message arrives , you can come with me , and see your father again .
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 's been over two years since we 've seen Dad .
#Text=" Katara says : " I do really miss him , it would be great to see Dad .
#Text=" Bato says : " It 's been far too long , has n't it ?
#Text=I 'm not sure when word will arrive , but when it does - " Sokka says : " It would be great , but we ca n't .
#Text=We have to take Aang to the North Pole first .
#Text=" Katara says : " Even if we do have time to wait for the message , who knows how far we 'd have to travel .
#Text=We do n't have time for a long detour .
#Text=" Bato says : " I 'm sure your father would understand , and be proud that his children are helping the Avatar .
